snippet: The Web site, often referred to for its predicative abilities, warned in a statement that it may go out of business because of a $700,000 shortfall.
lead_paragraph: The Web site, often referred to for its predicative abilities, warned in a statement that it may go out of business because of a $700,000 shortfall.

headline.seo: Online Betting Site Intrade Faces Liquidation
headline.main: Online Betting Site Intrade Faces Liquidation
